about_the_game: 《Lily Fantasia》 is a brand new piano themed rhythm game! Wield the magic piano and fight for yourself! This is our exciting demo version for you to experience! With 4 free songs to play, let's find out what we have to offer!
detailed_description: 《Lily Fantasia》 is a brand new piano themed rhythm game! Wield the magic piano and fight for yourself! This is our exciting demo version for you to experience! With 4 free songs to play, let's find out what we have to offer!
name: Lily Fantasia [Demo]
short_description: Welcome, to the demo version of the brand new piano-themed rhythm game 《Lily Fantasia》! Join the mysterious vampire, Lily, in a race against time to save your sickened mother. Overcome fierce enemies, wield the magical piano, and become the Rhythm Master you were always destined to!
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
